title: Epazz ZenaPay Acquires Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker App, Which Has Been Downloaded More Than 24,000 Times
text:
CHICAGO, IL , April 11, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Epazz Inc. (OTC: EPAZ), a leading provider of blockchain cryptocurrency mobile apps and cloud-based business software solutions, announced today that the company has acquired the Play Store app Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker, which has been downloaded more than 24,000 times. Similar simulated games have been downloaded more than one million times and have generated in-app revenue. The company believes with additional marketing efforts and new features, Tap Tap Bitcoin can achieve similar success. Among the new features will be multiuser chat rooms and cryptocurrencies wallet. Gaming apps are a major revenue stream in the bitcoin marketplace. They help educate newcomers on how bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies work, which in turn converts gamers into users of other cryptocurrency apps.
Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker joins Epazz’s growing portfolio of cryptocurrency mobile apps. Over the past four months the company has acquired CryptoFolio, Bitcoin Alticoin Tracker and Bitcoin Charts. The development team has been working on combining the apps to allow users to access in-app purchases. Tap Tap Bitcoin Clickers allows Epazz to cross sale its other CryptoFolio and educates newcomers on the power of blockchain.
Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker users will soon have an option to download ZenaPay, CryptoFolio, Bitcoin Alticoin Tracker and Bitcoin Charts, and current users of those apps will be able to download Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker. CryptoFolio chat rooms will also be available on Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker.
“Cryptocurrency is still in its early stages [and] the technology has not been fully utilized,” said Shaun Passley, PhD, CEO of Epazz Inc. “We need [to] quickly enter into the market and provide the market with cutting-edge technology to build and grow a user base, [and] Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker will help us.”
For more information on the Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker Play Store app, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.exapp.bitcoinworld .
About Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker
Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker — Easy Bitcoin Mining! This is the first game that will give you the opportunity to plunge into the atmosphere of the new world of cryptocurrency, to become a part of the system that changes the future of everything surrounding you in front of your eyes.
It’s an exciting strategy clicker, bitcoin mining simulator. You start from scratch as a poor student living in a dorm room with old furniture and a computer. All you have is a small amount of money to spend on your first bitcoin miner, but you quickly earn your first virtual bitcoins. In addition, you earn virtual currency by tapping on the screen.
With your earnings, you can update your wardrobe, have pets, buy new furniture and purchase new video cards and other components of your bitcoin farms. In the game there ways to invest money to multiply your income.
Soon you will have an opportunity to buy new buildings and hire employees. Would you like to build your bitcoin empire? Would you like to progress from a poor student to a cryptocurrency tycoon with dozens of buildings and hundreds of workers? Then this game is for you!
Tap Tap Bitcoin Clicker offers the following features:
- You have the chance to create your own farm and become a real magnate in the world of cryptocurrency.
- You can make investments and earn even more.
- You can select the gender of the character and dress him/her as you wish.
- The game has several skins locations and various upgrades for technology and furniture. There is even an opportunity to purchase your own pets.
- Your bitcoin farm works offline.
About ZenaPay ( www.zenapay.com )
ZenaPay is being developed to solve a major problem in high-risk industries: getting paid. Traditional banking systems do not allow high-risk industries to access their payment systems. ZenaPay offers a cutting-edge payment solution that gives consumers a way to buy items online or in stores using Bitcoin. The new Bitcoin payment software will allow consumers to use digital currency to make online or in-store purchases with ease. The process will also be anonymous because all transaction details are encrypted through Bitcoin, which will enable stores to accept digital currency instead of only cash. ZenaPay is available on the App Store and Play Store.
About Epazz, Inc. ( www.epazz.com )
Epazz, Inc. specializes in enterprise cryptocurrency blockchain mobile apps and cloud business process software, with more than 500 repeat customers. The new Bitcoin Mobile app is a financial technology company that offers unique software that allows consumers to acquire Bitcoin at the point of sale. The consumer can then use the cryptocurrency or digital currency to make a purchase at the store with ease. Epazz technology makes it easy to convert legacy systems into cloud business process software, for which the company then charges an annual subscription fee. Epazz has acquired 11 software companies that have converted or are in the process of converting their legacy software products to cloud software using Epazz technology. Epazz then markets the new cloud-based solutions to new and existing customers.
